Scorponok nods as Nightshift talked, doing a littl=
e to help Nightshift
steady himself. With his large clawed hands he snipped=
 off the arrows
as best as he could. Even as did so, he never let his optic=
 sensor
stray from either the Ark nor the fallen form of Tuscon in the
dist=
ance.

"We don't have much time." Scorponok said, the familliar bored
brusk=
ness in his voice. "No doubt more maximals and Predacons will be
out here m=
omentarilly." He looked at Nightshift, "You are a
Decepticon, can you fly?"=
